title: Introduction to Next.js
content: Next.js is a React framework for production.

title: Understanding SSG
content: Static Site Generation pre-renders pages at build time.

title: What is Routing?
content: Next.js has a file-system based router built on the concept of pages.

title: Server Side Rendering
content: SSR renders pages on each request.

title: Next.js API Routes
content: API routes provide a solution to build your API with Next.js.

title: Bai test thu nghiem
content: Noi dung nay duoc them nong ma khong can khoi dong lai server.
